sentence.text: The clinical presentation was severe, early-onset, progressive spliceosomal snRNP assembly-like motor neuronopathy, cerebellar atrophy, and in one affected individual, congenital fractures of the long bones.

In summary, we show that variants in nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process result in a neurological syndrome combining cerebellar atrophy and spinal motoneuronopathy, thus expanding the list of human exosomopathies
